name: Shoot'Em (ShauryaPal)
description:
Shoot'Em is a 2D PvP Shooting Game. 

You can play this with your friends and family.

It's made by a solo game developer.

Assets used in game are from Kenney.

Controls - 

W and S for Movement,

A and D for climbing ladders.

Scroll Wheel or AlphaNumeric Keys to switch between guns,

and LeftClick For Shooting.
